name: Oscilloscope
description: This algorithm implements a simple but useful 2-channel oscilloscope.

parameters.name: Trigger_voltage
parameters.description: Set the trigger voltage - the voltage the input signal has to cross to trigger the oscilloscope.

parameters.name: Time_range
parameters.description: Sets the time range corresponding to the full width of the display. The special value "Auto" sets the time range to the time between consecutive triggers.

parameters.name: Display_mode
parameters.description: Sets which waveforms are displayed and how. The options are "Overlaid", "Split", "Channel 1", "Channel 2", and "XY". In "XY" mode, inputs 1 & 2 are used as the coordinates to draw, instead of using time as the abscissa.

parameters.name: Vertical_scale_1
parameters.description: Sets the vertical scale for channel 1. The options are 10V, 5V, 2V, and 1V.

parameters.name: Vertical_scale_2
parameters.description: Sets the vertical scale for channel 2.
